Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.communication

Interface ClientCommunicationInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RMIClientCommunicationInterface, SocketClientCommunicationInterface
    public interface ClientCommunicationInterface
    Provides a standardized method to send NetworkMessages from a VirtualClient or any other server-side entity to a client-side entity. Note that this interface provides a unidirectional communication and should not be used from a client-side entity to communicate with a server-side entity. To do so, please refer to ServerCommunicationInterface.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void sendMessage​(NetworkMessage message)
      Provides a standardized method to send a given NetworkMessage to a client-side entity.

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage​(NetworkMessage message)
          throws ConnectionException
        Provides a standardized method to send a given NetworkMessage to a client-side entity.
        Parameters:
        message - the NetworkMessage to be sent.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if any network related exception is thrown by the implementer method.
